name: Dapper Jeans - Regular fit Jeans
description: Regular Fit jeans with comfortable fit, not too tight, increasing flexibility when moving. Deep navy blue color exudes masculinity, traditional pockets, sturdy stitching and contrast seams. 50% discount from 1,190,000₫ to 595,000₫.

name: Regular Smart Jeans
description: Basic jeans, ankle length, featuring contrasting stitching details, 4-pocket design, button closure with belt loops, YKK zipper, custom-made buttons, selected Denim material, free from dyes and harmful chemicals, highly durable, resistant to fading and discoloration, maintains good shape, easy to mix and match with various outfits.

name: Plain Slim Tuysi Pants

Plain pants, ankle-length, made of premium Tuysi blended fabric. The design can be easily mixed with different types of tops to create diverse youthful and dynamic styles.

name: Khaki Pants

name: Jogger Sweatpants
description: Material: Using Interlock fabric composed of 65% Cotton 30% Polyester 5% Spandex. Features windproof, thermal insulation to keep body warm. Long pants with elastic waistband, drawstring for easy waist adjustment, 2 square front pockets. Cuffed leg openings.
